mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Qna WHERE isFromUser = FALSE AND isActive = TRUE ORDER BY orderNo ASC
SELECT * FROM Qna WHERE isFromUser = TRUE AND isActive = TRUE AND memberId = #{memberId} ORDER BY regDate DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE qna SET isActive = FALSE, updateDate = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE qna SET title = #{title}, body = #{body}, isSecret = #{isSecret}, updateDate = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE qna SET isAnswered = #{isAnswered}, updateDate = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT q.*, m.name AS memberName, EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM vet_answer va WHERE va.qna_id = q.id) AS hasAnswer FROM qna q JOIN member m ON q.memberId = m.id ORDER BY q.regDate DESC
SELECT q.*, m.name AS memberName FROM qna q JOIN member m ON q.memberId = m.id WHERE q.id = #{id}
